snippet: The iPad, considered a side business for Apple when it was introduced in 2010, created an entire new category of consumer electronics. Soon tablets will be more popular that PCs, some analysts say.
abstract: The iPad, considered a side business for Apple when it was introduced in 2010, created an entire new category of consumer electronics. Soon tablets will be more popular that PCs, some analysts say.

headline.main: As New iPad Debut Nears, Some See Decline of PCs
